title: Live in Detroit: Welcome to SUR!
description:
In the beginning...there was Vanderpump Rules Episode One: Welcome to Sur! We're live in Detroit at the Majestic Theater to cover the first episode ever of one of our all time faves. Thanks for the amazing night you gave us, Detroit! Enjoy!
This week's bonus is a chat about Las Vegas, old people at the gym, and the first two parts of the Married to Medicine Reunion. To hear it, become a premium subscriber at http://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
***Crappens Live is coming to Chicago, San Francisco, Phoenix, Irvine, DC, and Atlanta! Find ticket links at watchwhatcrappens.com.
———————————

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
